articles.title: Four killed and two injured in road accident in Andhra Pradesh Nandyal district

articles.title: Three killed as bus rams into car on NH - 16 near Guntur
articles.summary: Three persons were killed on the spot in a tragic road accident on National Highway-16 in the early hours of Friday (December 26, 2025) under the limits of Nallapadu police station, in Guntur district of Andhra Pradesh. According to police, the accident occurred at around 5.30 a.m. on the third lane of NH-16, opposite Kommineni Cold Storage. The car was travelling from Tirupati to Suryapet in Telangana.
